channel.title: Battle-Rune #751
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/KBcZDzi.png[/img]
[font=comic sans ms][i]Battle-Rune is a RuneScape Based private server based on the 751 Revision of RuneScape, Battle-Rune is written by James & Sir tom base off our 742 Ieldor. The server has a lot of features that will benefit us in the long run, Our main goal is to provide endless fun on a newer version of RuneScape.[/i][/font]
Updates will be posted though out the thread.
[left][u][i]Notable Features[/i][/u]
[ul][li]Groovy Scripting - All content will be done via script.[/li] [li]OpenRS - Update Server[/li] [li]Netty 4-Final[/li][/ul] [/left]
[u]Server Information[/u] The server core was written by Sir tom, and improve by the team of Battle-Rune, We will try to keep this thread updated after we complete something big or a few little things. The server will be based like Z508 however with some improvements in ways of Efficiency.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lPdwqp7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QW3mWGs.gif[/img] [/center]

item.title: Battle-Rune #751

item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

If you are not recruiting, then this thread should be here: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,125.0.html

Nonetheless, it looks like notable development. I’ll keep watching this.

Read full topic

item.title: Battle-Rune #751
item.dc:creator: @Sir_James1996 Sir James1996
item.description:
@Sir_James1996 wrote:

[center]

[font=comic sans ms]Battle-Rune is a RuneScape Based private server based on the 751 Revision of RuneScape,
Battle-Rune is written by James & Sir tom base off our 742 Ieldor. The server has a lot of features that will benefit us in the long run,
Our main goal is to provide endless fun on a newer version of RuneScape.[/font]

Updates will be posted though out the thread.

[left]Notable Features

[ul][li]Groovy Scripting - All content will be done via script.[/li]
[li]OpenRS - Update Server[/li]
[li]Netty 4-Final[/li][/ul]
[/left]

Server Information
The server core was written by Sir tom, and improve by the team of Battle-Rune,
We will try to keep this thread updated after we complete something big or a few little things.
The server will be based like Z508 however with some improvements in ways of Efficiency.



[/center]
